feed.title: ddefig's PEAR Channel Server Latest Releases

entry.title: SeedDMS_Core 4.3.8 (stable)
entry.content:
SeedDMS is a web based document management system (DMS). This is the core of it, providing the basic functionality to create/update and delete folders and documents. It also contains a user and group managment
- new method SeedDMS_Core_DMS::getStatisticalData()

entry.title: SeedDMS_Lucene 1.1.4 (stable)
entry.content:
SeedDMS is a web based document management system (DMS). This is the fulltext search engine for it, based on Lucene.
class SeedDMS_Lucene_Search::search returns false if query is invalid instead of an empty result record

entry.title: SeedDMS_Preview 1.1.2 (stable)
entry.content:
SeedDMS is a web based document management system (DMS). These are the classes to create preview images from the document content.
create fixed width image with proportional height
